title: OJS HTTP Heartbeat Request
description: Request body for POST /ojs/v1/workers/heartbeat. Extends the visibility timeout of active jobs and reports worker liveness.

worker_id.title: Worker ID
worker_id.description: Unique identifier for the worker process sending the heartbeat.

active_jobs.title: Active Job IDs
active_jobs.description: List of job IDs the worker is currently processing. The server extends the visibility timeout for each listed job.

visibility_timeout_ms.title: Visibility Timeout Extension (ms)
visibility_timeout_ms.description: Requested visibility extension in milliseconds for active jobs.
